Hi,
I'm starting a new project. I was planning to use the June 2008 release CAL. Now I realize that there's a newer version (Prism V2). However, it seems to me that the added value of Prism is in writing multi-targeted applications. My application is planned to be used only on the desktop so I wonder if there is any added value by switching to Prism V2 for my purpose? Are there other major enhancements I'm missing?
Thank you,
Ken

Hi

 

Perhaps you could find useful the following post by Blaine Wastell (P&P Program Manager of the Composite Application Guidance for Silverlight project) that discusses the main features about Prism-V2:

·         Scope for Prism 2.0

 

Please let me know if this helps.

 

Damian Schenkelman

http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman

Thank you Damian, it did help.  If anyone else have other input I'll be happy to hear :).
Thank you,
Ken
